sentence.Network_en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

sentence.Network_en: You need hard currency to get anything halfway decent.
sentence.Network_cn: 你得有硬通货才能买到还算不错的东西。

sentence.Network_en: He must make a decent living from other artists covering his songs.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他艺术家翻唱他的歌曲，一定使他过上了收入颇为可观的生活。

list.abs: 收藏查看体面劳动本词条缺少信息栏，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ “体面劳动”(decent work)的概念。其定义是，通过促进就业、加强社会保障、维护劳动者基本权益，以及开展政府、企业组织和工会三方的.
有关于pay的常用短语，谢了~~~~_百度知道 ... pay slip 工资单 decent pay 令人轻视不得的薪水 pay my respect to 拜访以示敬意.
December(abbr. Dec.) 十二月decentered lens 偏轴透镜decentration aberration 偏心像差，偏轴像差.
...让低收入者分享社会发展的成果， 保证贫困人口过上“体面的生活”（Decent Life），而不仅仅是免除生存危机。

jx.jx_en_mean: take the most honourable or appropriate course of action, even if is not necessarily in one's own interests

lj.lj_ly: after his defeat he should do the decent thing and step down.
lj.lj_ls: 在被击败之后，他应该不失体面地下台。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'suitable, appropriate'): from Latin decent- 'being fitting', from the verb decere

entry.tran: 像样的;尚好的;过得去的
entry.def: Decent is used to describe something which is considered to be of an acceptable standard or quality.

example.ex: Nearby is a village with a decent pub...
example.tran: 附近的村子里有一家还不错的酒馆。

example.ex: He didn't get a decent explanation...
example.tran: 他没有得到一个像样的解释。

entry.tran: 合宜的;得体的;适当的;正当的
entry.def: Decent is used to describe something which is morally correct or acceptable.

example.ex: But, after a decent interval, trade relations began to return to normal...
example.tran: 但是适当地间断一段时间后，贸易关系开始恢复正常。

example.ex: She watched his face, as the coffin was lowered into the ground. As soon as it was decent, he plunged through the crowd towards the cars.
example.tran: 棺材慢慢放入墓穴时她一直注视着他的脸。礼仪许可的时间一到，他便挤过人群走向那些车子。

entry.def: Decent people are honest and behave in a way that most people approve of.

example.ex: The majority of people around here are decent people...
example.tran: 这里的大多数人都很正派。

example.ex: The jury will see what a decent guy he is.
example.tran: 陪审团将会认识到他是一个多么正派的人。

entry.tran: 做（不想做但）应该做的事
entry.def: If you say that someone should do the decent thing, you mean that they should do something which they do not really want to do, but which you think they ought to do.

example.ex: He should do the decent thing and resign.

means.word_mean: 1. socially or conventionally correct; refined or virtuous;

sentences.sentence: "it is not comme il faut for a gentleman to be constantly asking for money"

means.word_mean: 3. conforming to conventions of sexual behavior;

sentences.sentence: "speech in this circle, if not always decent, never became lewd"- George Santayana

means.word_mean: 6. observing conventional sexual mores in speech or behavior or dress;

sentences.sentence: "though one of her shoulder straps had slipped down, she was perfectly decent by current standards"

auth_sentence.content: Will they have decent jobs or will they not?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will they have decent jobs or will they not?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will they have decent jobs or will they not?

auth_sentence.content: It was a decent book, Mr. Bass recalled.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a decent book, Mr. Bass recalled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a decent book, Mr. Bass recalled.

auth_sentence.content: It was a bit hard to get anything decent.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a bit hard to get anything decent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a bit hard to get anything decent.

Sentence.sentence: And by then people were just happy to have a decent quantity of food in their kitchens.
They have a harder time getting a job with decent pay.

means.word_mean: 人或行为举止正派的；公平的；合乎礼节的

sentences.en: I didn't have a decent dress for the dance.
sentences.cn: 我没有参加舞会的合适的衣服。

sentences.en: Those tight trousers of yours aren't very decent!
sentences.cn: 你那条紧身裤真不雅观！

means.word_mean: 像样的, 过得去的, 体面的，相当不错的，尚好的

sentences.en: It is not decent to do so.

means.word_mean: 令人满意的, 相当好的

sentences.cn: 他挣一份很不错的工资。

jushi.english: I need a decent night's sleep.
jushi.chinese: 我需要好好地睡上一觉。

jushi.english: Everyone said he was a decent sort of guy.
jushi.chinese: 人人都说他是个品行端正的小伙子。
他总是使用正统的语言。
